attributes.action: allow Special Constables to transfer directly in to the full time force without the full recruitment process
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Special Constables carry the same equipment and have the same powers as Police Officers, yet should they wish to become Police Officers they have to start the recruitment process again, despite actually doing the job. This petition aims to get the Prime Minister to allow Special Constables who have completed their probationary period and who pass an internal interview to join the full time force without having to go through the full process.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
